articles.title: Jacky Wu asks for heavy sentence after son nabbed over drug use - AsiaOne
articles.description: Jacky Wu's son Ricky got into trouble again. This time, the 23-year-old musician, who goes by the name LucyPIE, was caught smoking marijuana outside a Taipei nightclub early Sunday (Dec 26) morning. While Ricky was chatting with friends outside the venue, pol…
articles.content:
Jacky Wu's son Ricky got into trouble again.
This time, the 23-year-old musician, who goes by the name LucyPIE, was caught smoking marijuana outside a Taipei nightclub early Sunday (Dec 26) morning.… [+1247 chars]

articles.title: Eyimofe makes Guardian UK's best films from Africa, Asia, Latin America list - Guardian Nigeria
articles.description: Eyimofe has been picked along with nine others on a shortlist of top films from Africa, Asia and Latin America by The Guardian of the UK.
articles.content:
